import axios from"axios";// const API_URL = "http://localhost:8080/api/recipe";
const API_URL="/api/recipe";class RecipeService{static getAllRecipe(){let token;if(localStorage.getItem("user")){token=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user")).token;}else{token="";}return axios.get(API_URL,{headers:{Authorization:token}});}static getUserRecipe(userId){let token;if(localStorage.getItem("user")){token=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user")).token;}else{token="";}return axios.get(API_URL+"/user/".concat(userId),{headers:{Authorization:token}});}static getByIngrs(ingrs){let token;if(localStorage.getItem("user")){token=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user")).token;}else{token="";}console.log(ingrs);return axios.post(API_URL+"/ingrs",{ingrs},{headers:{Authorization:token}});}static getByCats(cats){let token;if(localStorage.getItem("user")){token=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user")).token;}else{token="";}return axios.post(API_URL+"/cats",{cats},{headers:{Authorization:token}});}static getRecipe(recipeId){let token;if(localStorage.getItem("user")){token=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user")).token;}else{token="";}return axios.get(API_URL+"/".concat(recipeId),{headers:{Authorization:token}});}static getRecipeItem(recipeId){let token;if(localStorage.getItem("user")){token=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user")).token;}else{token="";}return axios.get(API_URL+"/".concat(recipeId,"/item"),{headers:{Authorization:token}});}static getRecipeCat(recipeId){let token;if(localStorage.getItem("user")){token=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user")).token;}else{token="";}return axios.get(API_URL+"/".concat(recipeId,"/category"),{headers:{Authorization:token}});}static getLiked(recipeId){let token;if(localStorage.getItem("user")){token=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user")).token;}else{token="";}return axios.get(API_URL+"/liked/".concat(recipeId),{headers:{Authorization:token}});}static addLiked(recipeId){let token;if(localStorage.getItem("user")){token=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user")).token;}else{token="";}return axios.post(API_URL+"/liked/".concat(recipeId),{},{headers:{Authorization:token}});}static deleteLiked(recipeId){let token;if(localStorage.getItem("user")){token=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user")).token;}else{token="";}return axios.delete(API_URL+"/liked/".concat(recipeId),{headers:{Authorization:token}});}}export default RecipeService;
